title: Jamie Vardy 'UNFOLLOWS Wayne Rooney on social media' amid WAG war between their wives
text:
Jamie Vardy has reportedly unfollowed Wayne Rooney on social media amid the feud between their respective wives Rebekah and Coleen.

On Sunday, The Sun reported the Leicester City striker, 32, is so upset with the way things have played out between the I'm A Celeb star, 37, and her fellow WAG, 33, that he has removed the sportsman, also 33, from his Instagram and Twitter accounts.

A source told the publication: 'Jamie has always got on well with Wayne, but he won’t stand for having his wife hung out to dry in public like this.'

Making a statement: Jamie Vardy has reportedly unfollowed Wayne Rooney on social media amid the feud between their respective wives Rebekah and Coleen

The insider added that footballer Jamie is standing by his wife of three years '100 per cent' as she launches a fight to prove her innocence against claims that she sold false stories about Coleen.

Said a friend: 'He’s totally behind Becky and furious with the Rooneys for the way they have gone about this.

'He and Wayne always got on well and he likes him. But he has made his feelings clear. Cutting him off on social media is a totally deliberate snub.'

MailOnline has contacted Jamie's representatives for further comment.

Oh dear: On Sunday, The Sun reported the Leicester City striker, 32, has removed the sportsman, 33, from his Instagram and Twitter accounts (pictured last year)

Moving on: 'Jamie has always got on well with Wayne, but he won’t stand for having his wife hung out to dry in public like this', a source claimed

Rebekah cut her family holiday in Dubai short after Coleen's dramatic accusation on Wednesday, which has enthralled Britain in the so-called 'war of the WAGs.'

The brunette is said to have threatened her new rival with legal action over allegations of leaking staged Instagram stories, warning her: 'Believe me or I'll see you in court.'

The feuding pair are reportedly communicating through their lawyers in the wake of the bitter row which has dominated social media and newspapers this week.

A source close to heavily pregnant Rebekah now claims she is fully prepared to face her fellow WAG in court if she refuses to believe her.

Tense: Rebekah cut her family holiday in Dubai short after Coleen's accusation on Wednesday, which has enthralled Britain in the so-called 'war of the WAGs (pictured last month)

Jamie's wife recently gave an interview with The Daily Mail, in which she insisted arguing with Coleen is akin to rowing 'with a pigeon'.

It has been revealed that Rebekah has hired a team of forensic IT experts after the mother-of-four accused her of selling stories to the press through information she obtained from her private Instagram.

An insider exclusively told MailOnline on Wednesday that 'Rebekah wants to prove she had nothing to do with the leaked stories and is working with a lawyer and IT experts who can look at the forensics of her Instagram, which several people have access to.'

Meanwhile, friends of the Liverpudlian beauty say she will not be goaded into coming forward with any further evidence as she is happy with her own investigations.

'Ill see you in court': The brunette is said to have threatened her new rival Coleen (pictured in 2016) with legal action over allegations of leaking staged Instagram stories

Rebekah had previously demanded to see screenshots of the Instagram stories and who had viewed them.

They added: 'Rebekah has been incredibly stressed and hasn't stopped sobbing all day, which is very out of character for her.

'The whole situation has left her distraught and she still doesn't understand why Coleen didn't reach out to her first to ask her outright about the issue.

'She's flying home early from Dubai as she feels her time abroad has been spoilt and all she wants is to be surrounded by family.

A spokesman for Coleen said: 'It is irrefutable that the leaks came from one account, and one account only.'
description: The Leicester City striker, 32, has reportedly unfollowed Wayne, 33, on social media amid the feud between their respective wives Rebekah, 37, and Coleen, also 33.
